b'Pia Carrot e Youkoso!!': b'Yusuke Kinoshita is forced by his father to work at his restaurant Pia Carrot all summer due to his bad grades in school. What first seems to be a boring job becomes a memorable experience due to his interactions with his co-workers and his boss. \n\n(Source: ANN)'
